Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 07/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
